  -fno-strict-aliasing
  --param=ssp-buffer-size=4
  -fstack-protector
  -Wno-builtin-macro-redefined
  -D__DATE__=
  -D__TIME__=
  -D__TIMESTAMP__=

  -fPIC
  -pipe
  -fcolor-diagnostics

  -fno-strict-aliasing
  --param=ssp-buffer-size=4
  -fstack-protector
  -Wno-builtin-macro-redefined
  -D__DATE__=
  -D__TIME__=
  -D__TIMESTAMP__=
  -funwind-tables
  -fPIC
  -pipe
  -fcolor-diagnostics
  -no-canonical-prefixes
  -ffunction-sections
  -fno-short-enums

  -march=x86-64
  -Oz
  -fno-ident
  -fdata-sections
  -ffunction-sections
  -fomit-frame-pointer
  -g1
  -fdebug-info-for-profiling
  -fvisibility=hidden

  -load

  -add-plugin

  check-ipc

  -Wno-missing-field-initializers

  -Wno-c++11-narrowing

  -Wno-inconsistent-missing-override
